alert.note: Alert for Shoshone (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued April 04 at 6:07PM MDT until April 04 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central Shoshone County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 600 PM PDT. * At 505 PM PDT, a dangerous snow squall was located between Mullan and Lookout Pass. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous travel. * This includes Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 63 and 73. Locations impacted include... Mullan and Lookout Pass. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Wet roadways will quickly freeze. Black ice will cause roads, bridges and overpasses to become slick and dangerous. Slow down and be prepared for sudden loss of traction.
